      • makeRequest

        public <T> T makeRequest(Class<T> returnType,
                Requester.BackendCaller backendCaller)
              throws HodErrorException
        Makes a request to HP Haven OnDemand using a TokenProxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Type Parameters:
        T - The desired type of the value returned by HP Haven OnDemand
        Parameters:
        returnType - The desired type of the value returned by HP Haven OnDemand
        backendCaller - Makes the request to HP Haven OnDemand
        Returns:
        An object representing the output from HP Haven OnDemand
        Throws:
        HodErrorException
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been configured

      • makeRequest

        public <T> T makeRequest(TokenProxy tokenProxy,
                Class<T> returnType,
                Requester.BackendCaller backendCaller)
              throws HodErrorException
        Makes a request to HP Haven OnDemand using the given TokenProxy
        Type Parameters:
        T - The desired type of the value returned by HP Haven OnDemand
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use to make the request
        returnType - The desired type of the value returned by HP Haven OnDemand
        backendCaller - Makes the request to HP Haven OnDemand
        Returns:
        An object representing the output from HP Haven OnDemand
        Throws:
        HodErrorException
